data_table.description: Subject ID, consent group, subject source, and source subject ID of participants with or without prostate cancer and involved in the "Genetic Predictors of Adverse Radiotherapy Effects (Gene-PARE)" project.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects

variable.name: SUBJECT_SOURCE
variable.value: Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository
